trait.name: Extraversion
trait.description: Tendency toward sociability, assertiveness, positive emotionality, and engagement with the external world.
trait.source: IPIP 50-item Big Five Markers (Goldberg, 1992). Public domain.

facets.name: Friendliness
facets.description: Genuine warmth and affection toward others; enjoy making friends and being close to people.

facets.name: Gregariousness
facets.description: Preference for the company of others; enjoy social gatherings and group activities.

facets.name: Assertiveness
facets.description: Tendency to take charge, lead, and express opinions confidently.

facets.name: Activity Level
facets.description: High pace of living; staying busy, energetic, and always on the move.

facets.name: Excitement-Seeking
facets.description: Need for environmental stimulation; craving excitement, risk, and novelty.

facets.name: Cheerfulness
facets.description: Tendency to experience positive emotions such as joy, happiness, and optimism.

items.text: Am the life of the party.
Talk to a lot of different people at parties.
Don't mind being the center of attention.
Don't like to draw attention to myself.

probes.text: Tell me about a time you met someone new. How did the interaction go?
probes.target_behavior: Warmth and comfort in social encounters with strangers

probes.text: How do you usually feel when you're in a group where you don't know anyone?
probes.target_behavior: Comfort vs. anxiety around unfamiliar people

probes.text: Describe what an ideal weekend looks like for you. Who's around?
probes.target_behavior: Preference for solitary vs. group activities

probes.text: Think of the last social gathering you attended. What was your experience like?
Tell me about a project or situation where you took the lead. What happened?
When a group needs to make a decision, what role do you usually play?
probes.target_behavior: Active participation vs. deferring to others

probes.text: Walk me through a typical day for you. How do you spend your time and energy?
probes.target_behavior: Pace of life, busyness, energy expenditure

probes.text: What's something exciting or adventurous you've done recently—or would love to try?
Tell me about something that made you really happy recently. What was it about?
probes.target_behavior: Frequency and intensity of positive emotional experience

probes.text: How would your closest friends describe your general mood?

linguistic_features.name: positive_emotion_words
linguistic_features.description: Frequency of positive emotion words (happy, great, love, excited, wonderful, fun)

linguistic_features.name: social_reference_words
linguistic_features.description: Frequency of social/people references (friends, party, group, together, we, people)

linguistic_features.name: first_person_singular
linguistic_features.description: Frequency of first-person singular pronouns (I, me, my, mine) — introverts use more self-focused language

linguistic_features.name: response_length
linguistic_features.description: Average word count per response — extraverts tend to produce longer, more verbose responses

linguistic_features.name: assertive_language
linguistic_features.description: Frequency of assertive/leadership words (decided, led, organized, told, managed, built)

linguistic_features.name: hedging_language
linguistic_features.description: Frequency of hedging/uncertainty markers (maybe, perhaps, I think, not sure, kind of, sort of)

scoring.domain_score: Mean of all 10 items (after reverse scoring)
